title: Public Reports of Train Fault at Canberra MRT Station

title_translations.zh-Hans: 坎贝拉地铁站列车故障的公众报告
title_translations.ms: Laporan Awam tentang Kerosakan Kereta Api di Stesen MRT Canberra
title_translations.ta: கன்பெரா எம்ஆர்டி நிலையத்தில் ரயில் பழுதுபற்றிய பொது அறிக்கைகள்

updates.text: A commuter reported taking the North-South Line (NSL) train from Admiralty at 8:15 AM and did not observe any delays. They noted that if there had been a delay, it must have been brief.
At 7:30am, a train fault was announced over the PA system, with the fault occurring at Canberra station. Commuters are advised to make alternative travel arrangements to avoid delays or congestion.
